default_policy.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
default_policy.jcr:title: Content Download

footer_policy.jcr:description: Sets a <footer> element on the page footer experience fragment.
footer_policy.jcr:title: Page Footer

header_policy.jcr:description: Sets a <header> element on the page header experience fragment.
header_policy.jcr:title: Page Header

form-container.jcr:description: Allows the form components to be dropped into this form container.
form-container.jcr:title: Content Form

default_policy.jcr:description: - Enable lazy loading for faster page loading. - Define allowed image widths for automatic loading of the image in the most optimal resolution, given the size at which each image is displayed on the page, and the visitor's pixel density. - Disallow direct asset upload, to force authors to first upload the images to Assets.
default_policy.jcr:title: Content Image

policy_xfm.jcr:title: Le Forem Site V2 Language Navigation - Experience Fragment

default_policy.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
default_policy.jcr:title: Content Teaser

default_policy.jcr:description: Allows all sizes, but not H1, which is reserved for the main page title.
default_policy.jcr:title: Content Title

mainpage_policy.jcr:description: Allows only H1 and disallows links for the main page title.
mainpage_policy.jcr:title: Page Title
